metadata.title: CVE-2021-3697 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A crafted JPEG image may lead the JPEG reader to underflow its datapointer, allowing user-controlled data to be written in heap. To asuccessful to be performed the attacker needs to perform some triage overthe heap layout and craft an image with a malicious format and payload.This vulnerability can lead to data corruption and eventual code executionor secure boot circumvention. This flaw affects grub2 versions priorgrub-2.12.

criterions.comment: grub2-unsigned package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
grub2-signed package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
